text.text_translated: Before, I worked five days a week. This was my normal week. Then I had my children and took time off work. After this, I wanted to spend more time with my children before they started school. So I talked to my boss. My boss and I agreed. I can now work three days a week. This meant I got less money. It was a big cut in my pay. This is because I only get paid for the days I work. But I still have the same amount of work. I now do five days of work in only three days, but I get much less money.

feedback.feedback:
PASS. The output meets all A2 criteria without deviation.
- Factual Integrity: The text is a 1:1 factual match with the original source. No information was lost or altered.
- Meaning and Fidelity: The MeaningBERT score of 0.755 and BERTScore of 0.9117 are within the required thresholds, confirming that the core message and key lexical items have been preserved.
- CEFR Compliance: The A2 classifier result is correct. The text exclusively uses A1 and A2 vocabulary as verified by the provided list. No B1+ vocabulary is present.
- Structural Simplicity: Sentence structures are consistently simple. Complex ideas from the original, such as 'pro-rata basis' and 'negotiating', have been correctly broken down into short, sequential A2 sentences using appropriate connectors like 'so' and 'because'. The output is a model of compliance.

best_attempt.text_translated: Before, I worked five days a week. This was my normal week. Then I had my children and took time off work. After this, I wanted to spend more time with my children before they started school. So I talked to my boss. We agreed that I could work three days a week. This meant I got less money. It was a big cut in my pay. This is because I only get paid for the days I work. But I still have the same amount of work. I now do five days of work in only three days, but I get much less money.
